elements.title: Deir el-Balah sarcophagi
elements.contents: ... that some of the Bronze Age Deir el-Balah sarcophagi (pictured) looted by Moshe Dayan became part of his private collection?

elements.title: Pennywise
elements.contents: ... that movie characters like Pennywise have been cited as contributing to some people's fear of clowns?

elements.title: Willows Inn
elements.contents: ... that the Willows Inn, headed by chef Blaine Wetzel, was one of the restaurants that inspired the horror comedy film The Menu?

elements.title: Magic Cat Academy
elements.contents: ... that the animator of the Magic Cat Academy Halloween-themed Google Doodles overcame her arachnophobia to design a spider boss that was ultimately rejected as "way too scary"?

elements.title: Cthulhu
elements.contents: ... that Cthulhu, Dagon, and Hydra are actually mud dragons living off the coast of Madagascar?

elements.title: Hal Hirshorn
elements.contents: ... that photographer Hal Hirshorn recreated the 1865 funeral of a wealthy Manhattanite for a 2011 photo series?

elements.title: Charlie the goat
elements.contents: ... that Charlie the goat hospitalized his co-star three times on the set of The Witch?

elements.title: All You Need Is Death
elements.contents: ... that when a prospective funder called the script for his horror film All You Need Is Death "weird and confusing", Paul Duane got the phrase tattooed on his arm and funded the film himself?
